Compressor: Not used, as the high-gain amp provides natural compression. 3. Overdrive/boost: Placed before the amp, typically a classic overdrive pedal with low drive and high level to tighten the low end and add clarity to pick attack. 4. Amplifier: Modern high-gain tube amp (e.g., Peavey 5150/6505 or Mesa/Boogie Dual Rectifier) set for aggressive distortion, tight bass, and crisp highs. 5. Cabinet: 4x12 closed-back cab with high-power speakers (e.g., Celestion V30s) for punch and definition. 6.
